param.name: search_limit
param.label: Search Limit
param.description: Number of Search items to return

param.name: item_id
param.label: Itemid
param.description: The id of the menu to append to the URLs so that the product page uses the corresponding HikaShop options

param.name: full_path
param.label: Full breadcrumb path
param.description: If the id set above is a products listing menu and that this option is toggled on, the breadcrumb path will contain the full category tree down to the product

param.name: out_of_stock_display
param.label: Out of stock products
param.description: Allow out of stock products to be displayed in the search results

param.name: new_page
param.label: New page
param.description: Open links on a new page

param.name: fields
param.label: Fields
param.description: Select the fields you want to be searchable
